alert.note: Alert for Helena Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 11:09AM MST until January 29 at 12:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT MST SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Helena Valley. * WHEN...From 11 AM Friday to Midnight MST Saturday Night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wet roads may quickly freeze and become extremely slippery late Friday afternoon as colder air surges south and snow continues. Gusty northerly winds could also cause
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
